title: Fontographer Lovers Rejoice!
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808230601/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 30.Nov.2005 3.56pm 

Fontographer lovers rejoice! Fontlab announces the release of Fontographer 4.7 for Macintosh - native on Mac OS X and with many functional and interface improvements, including:

路 native support for Mac OS X,  
路 support for the Euro character,  
路 updated encodings,  
路 copy-paste compatibility with new Illustrator and Freehand versions.

Fontographer 4.1 users can upgrade for US$99; Fontographer 3.x users for US$198; and TypeTool users for US$299.

Please browse to [http://www.fontlab.com/Font-tools/Fontographer/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808230601/http:/www.fontlab.com/Font-tools/Fontographer/ "http://www.fontlab.com/Font-tools/Fontographer/") for full details on the newest, easiest font editor around!

Happy fonting!  
The Fontlab Team
author: Miss Tiffany
